CARS IMPROVE LIFE EXPECTANCY! ” REMOVE THE EFFECTS OF… 15 Measures of relationship ▪ Bivariate correlation (r) ▫ Standardized index of how much two variables change with each other ▪ Squared Correlation (r2) ▫ Proportion of variability shared by 2 variables ▪ Multiple Regression ▫ A technique used when we want to test how well one or more predictors individually predict the criterion ▪ Multiple Correlation (R) ▫ A type of correlation coefficient that indexes how much a set of predictors, when combined, is related to the criterion ▪ Squared Multiple Correlation (R2) ▫ Proportion of variability in criterion accounted for by set of predictors ▪ Partial Correlation ▫ A correlation between X and Y that statistically removes the effect of 3rd variable 16 Any questions? 17
